tool_description: This API matches the candidate CV with the JD. The API responds the detailed matching score once the candidate CV matches with the JD.
name: Job and  Candidate Matching
title: Job and  Candidate Matching

api_list.name: One To One Match API
api_list.description: This API matches the candidate CV with the JD. The API responds the detailed matching score once the candidate CV matches with the JD.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-and-candidate-matching.p.rapidapi.com/oneMatch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-and-candidate-matching.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://job-and-candidate-matching.p.rapidapi.com/oneMatch"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-and-candidate-matching.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
